subject: Hello,
body:
Hello,
You are the one appointed by the Citizen of your country to be the
next of kin to his late father inheritance funds,in offshore bank.The
total funds been deposited is $10.8 million you are claiming. Send
your details
Best Regards
Barrister Andrew Dan

subject: Re:   Hello,
body:
Hello Barrister Andrew Dan,

Wow, that's quite a surprise! I had no idea about this. Can you tell me more about the late father and how he came to choose me as the next of kin? Also, could you please explain the process of claiming these funds? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Angelica
